attributes.action: Limit number of items all supermarkets and online shops can sell to people.
attributes.additional_details: If someone buys too many items in a supermarket or public shop then there will not be enough left for other people when they get around to shop in there.
attributes.background:
To limit the number of items each customer can buy in all supermarkets, 
 all grocery shops and all online supermarkets as well.
